title: Philippines Monggo Beans And Pechay (mung Beans And Bok Choi)
summary: Philippines Monggo Beans And Pechay (mung Beans And Bok Choi) is a gluten free, dairy free, and vegetarian recipe with 1 servings. One serving contains 1576 calories, 107g of protein, and 6g of fat. For $7.19 per serving, this recipe covers 74% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. If you have tomatoes, vegetarian chicken broth, garlic cloves, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the gingerroot you could follow this main course with the Gingerbread Cookie Bites (gluten-free Recipe*) as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 30 minutes. It works well as a pricey main course. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 90%. This score is excellent. Try Philippines Monggo Beans and Pechay (Mung Beans and Bok Choi), Monggo Beans (or Mung Bean Soup), and Stewed monggo (mung beans) with coconut cream for similar recipes.
